name: Amphibian (TophWells)
description:
A one-button game. Press Space or tap the screen. Be a frog. Lick bugs. Make friends. Reach the stars.

----------- HINTS -----------

Birds will eat worms, fish will eat flies - bring each one the thing they like, and they'll let you ride them. You can jump once in mid-air. Get treasures from the top and bottom of the world! The game won't formally end when you win, so you can play more if you want.

----------- CREDITS -----------

Programming, art, game design: Toph Wells

Sound design: Maize Wallin
